backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, posts, comments, conversations, and authorization-backed operations with in-memory storage and admin checks.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files for reference or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, authentication-gated layout, theme provider, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminEmplo: Admin UI for listing employees and adding new admins with principal validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and reconnection handling.
Top-level layout with navigation, user avatar, logout handling, and responsive header/footer wrapping page content.
frontend/src/components/messages/Convers: Renders a chat thread with partner info, message list, auto-scroll, message sending, and refresh control.
frontend/src/components/messages/InboxLi: Displays a list of conversations with partner profiles, last message preview, timestamps, and loading placeholders.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCompos: Form for creating text or photo posts with validation, upload progress, and Pro-user photo posting restrictions.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostIntera: Handles liking and commenting on posts, toggling comment visibility, and showing comment input and counts.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostList.t: Renders a list of posts with author info, timestamps, content display, and delete support for the author.
frontend/src/components/profile/FollowBu: Provides a follow/unfollow button with loading states and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/PlanStat: Shows the user's subscription plan, usage limits, and upgrade option with loading and admin handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileE: Allows users to edit profile details and upload a profile photo with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileH: Displays a user's profile info with avatar, bio, location, tags, and follow state handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Prompts new users to create their profile via a modal with required fields and validation.
frontend/src/components/system/QueryStat: Provides reusable loading, error, and empty UI states for data-fetching components.
frontend/src/components/users/UserCard.t: Displays a user profile card with avatar, bio, follower count, and follow/message actions using identity and follower query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Defines stable react-query keys for profiles, follows, posts, messages, discovery, and admin queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating and refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, and handling login states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for profiles, follows, posts, comments, messages, discovery, and admin actions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining color themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React, QueryClientProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ConversationPage.tsx: Renders a conversation thread with a specific user, ensuring authentication and providing refresh and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoveryPage.tsx: Shows a searchable list of other users for discovery, filtering results and enforcing authentication.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the main feed with post composer, post list, and a manual refresh option, requiring user authentication.
frontend/src/pages/InboxPage.tsx: Lists all user conversations with refresh capabilities, redirecting unauthenticated users to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page that redirects signed-in users to the feed and displays branding, feature highlights, and a login button.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileMePage.tsx: User's own profile page with tabs for editing, viewing info, posts, and admin tools; redirects to landing if not authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileUserPage.tsx: Displays another user's profile and posts based on principal ID, with navigation back to discovery and auth check.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing current feature set, architecture notes, and versioned requirements for the MeetGae app.
